data.text: (……my blood, feels like it's gone cold)
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
(But strangely, my face feels hot. My hands and feet feel fuzzy, 
and I can't properly put power in to them. Each beat of 
my heart reverberates through my body. So noisy.)
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: (Too noisy, too noisy! Shut up――!)
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: -ber…… Dober!
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text: Dober!
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text:
Dober, is something the matter? The call for the next 
participants to gather at the gates has already gone out～……
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text: Ah…… S-sorry. Thanks……
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: ……Dober, you look a little pale. If you're not feeling well――
data.name: Mejiro Bright

data.text: I'M FINE……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
……I'm fine so…… I'm not pushing myself. 
I just need to finish this mock race.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: That's it, that's all I need to do……!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Today's when Mejiro Dober is participating in a mock 
race. As a sub-trainer, together with Chief Trainer 
we were in the spectator seats, but――

choices.text: Um, didn't she seem a little off just now……?
choices.processed: <size=37>Um, didn't she seem a little off just now……?</size>

data.text:
That's true…… but right now, we should just watch over her. 
Look, it's almost time for Bell-chan to start.
data.name: Chief Trainer

data.text:
Chief Trainer said all that, but… this unsettling feeling 
became a reality during the race.
(―Bang!!)

Inside! Take the inside! Not yet, not yet, hold back, hold back! 
Senpai, do your best～! Big sis, go-!!
data.name: Spectators

data.text: Haa, haaa, kahaa……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
The running that Mejiro Dober was showing during 
the mock race, unlike the other day, had none 
of the same sharpness as before……!

(Don't look! Don't look! Don't look at the spectator seats! 
Focus on the race! If I focus, I'll definitely……!)
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOA-!!)
data.name: Spectators

data.text:
In the end, Mejiro Dober's run lacked the brilliance she had 
shown before and she ended the race in 8th……

You see, Bell-chan…… when she was young had a 
bitter experience, and because of that, she 
struggles when she's in front of a crowd.
data.name: Chief Trainer

data.text:
But even with that, it seems that on the wide, 
wide grounds of the Mejiro, in a training area that 
not many people see, she's been working as hard as she can―
data.name: Chief Trainer

data.text:
Surrounded only by maids and other Uma Musume. Because that's 
the environment she's been raised in, being in front of crowds… 
and particularly men, she still struggles with it now.
data.name: Chief Trainer

data.text:
That's why, in a real race, where the gaze of many, 
many people can be felt, she can't seem to show 
even a fraction of her true strength.
data.name: Chief Trainer

data.text:
Even though she came here because she wanted to enter races, 
wanted to win, it must be tough. It must have been painful this 
whole time…… But, you see.
data.name: Chief Trainer

data.text: ――Even with all that, Bell-chan, still hasn't given up.
data.name: Chief Trainer

data.text:
Several days after the mock race. While I was mulling over 
Chief Trainer's words while eating lunch――
……can I sit here?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Ehh?! Y-yeah!
Ehh?! Y-yeah!

data.text:
You don't need to act so scared…… I've never 
even taken the time to come talk to you so even 
I'm aware that this seems really sudden.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
……I've never even taken the time to come talk 
to you so I'm sorry if this seem sudden. I…… 
well…… I'm not good with strangers.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn 
in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
But, things can't keep going on like this…… it'll just turn 
in to a repeat of that last mock race, even I understand that.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
……That's why, speaking with you, is a kind of 
mental training! As the sub-trainer, hearing 
me out is part of your obligations, right?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Of course, I'll hear you out
Of course, I'll hear you out

data.text:
That's why…… even if it's a little bit at a time. Just like 
this, speaking to someone I'm not familiar with, might help me 
mentally…… can you help me with that?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Of course, I'll hear you out
Of course, I'll hear you out

data.text: ……Thanks.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: Thank you…… and I'm sorry.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
As Chief Trainer said, Mejiro Dober is very earnest―― 
Seeing her like that, I suddenly wanted to ask.

choices.text: Why did you step in to the world of racing?
choices.processed: <size=38>Why did you step in to the world of racing?</size>

choices.text: Why did you step in to the world of racing?
choices.processed: <size=38>Why did you step in to the world of racing?</size>

data.text:
As Chief Trainer said, Mejiro Dober is very earnest―― 
Seeing her like that, I suddenly wanted to ask.

choices.text: Why did you step in to the world of racing?
choices.processed: <size=38>Why did you step in to the world of racing?</size>

choices.text: Why did you step in to the world of racing?
choices.processed: <size=38>Why did you step in to the world of racing?</size>

data.text: What? That's kind of sudden……
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: Eh, that's kind of sudden. Hmmmmm――
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Nothing really…… it's pretty commonplace. In the first place, 
for Mejiro Uma Musume, the world of racing is something really 
close at hand…… but to put it simply, admiration.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Nothing really…… it's pretty commonplace. In the first place, 
for Mejiro Uma Musume, the world of racing is something really 
close at hand…… but to put it simply, admiration.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Ryannn! Hey, hey, hey, Ryan! 
I want to enter too! I want to enter the race too! Let me!!
data.name: Young Dober

data.text: Wawaa, Dober? What's wrong all of a sudden?
data.name: Young Ryan

data.text: I've decided! You see, me too――!
data.name: Young Dober

data.text:
Even me, I must have been born to run and win. 
It's just…… that's what I've decided on, in my heart.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Mejiro Dober declared that in an indifferent manner but…… 
in the light of those eyes, I could sense a very strong will.

But, I cant even run a race properly, let alone win, so it's not 
even worth considering. At any rate, I need to get stronger.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Trainer, she said she'd support even someone like me. 
That's why I…… need to win, for her as soon as possible……!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: If it's you, you'll definitely win
If it's you, you'll definitely win

data.text: What?…… Don't say that like it's easy.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: I really think that
I really think that

data.text:
Hm…… hearing you say that makes me happy. 
But, someone like me is still too weak――
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: I really think that
I really think that

data.text: ……Ah.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: ……Ah.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: ……Is that so?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
You're…… kinda weird, aren't you? I thought the only 
one who'd say something like that to me was Trainer.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
――Well, when you're done eating, come with me. Registration for a 
mock race…… is also part of being a sub-trainer, right?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Yeah, I'll go with you
Yeah, I'll go with you

data.text:
――Hey, can I ask you for a favor? 
After eating, I want to go register for a mock race.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Yeah, I'll go with you
Yeah, I'll go with you

data.text:
Next time, for sure…… I won't show 
such a disgraceful appearance.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Thanks. Next time, for sure, I'll show her that I can win. 
Well…… and you too, okay?.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
Mejiro Dober was desperately struggling. It was only slightly, 
but it seemed like the distance between us was shrinking――

Mejiro Dober was desperately struggling. It was only slightly, 
but it seemed like the distance between us was shrinking――
But that was just the start of things to come
But that was just the start of things to come

Excuse me. Trainer, about today's training―― 
Trainer?……are you…… sleeping……?
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text:
……?! Trainer, Trainer?! 
What's wrong……?!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: S-someone! Someone help, Trainer is……!!
data.name: Mejiro Dober
